features: SMOOTH HAIR: Conditions and nourishes to smooth hair for a shiny, sleek end-look
AN INFUSED BLEND: Of Vitamin E, Rose Hips and Jojoba Extract
SCENT EXPERIENCE: Luscious floral bouquet with rose petal top notes
MINDFULLY CREATED: Certified PETA Cruelty free, mineral oil and silicone free, dermatologist-tested, color safe and pH balanced
body.description: Herbal Essences is here to help you smooth things out. Our Smooth Collection Conditioner is formulated with soothing Vitamin E, Rose Hips and Jojoba Extracts to deeply condition and de-frizz hair for a soft, sleek end-look. It also helps restore hair’s natural shine. Plus, it’s free of silicones and mineral oil. Now those are some smooth moves!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our bio:renew botanicals are Kew certified Proud to be certified by PETA Many dermatologist-tested product options

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can't get enough of the Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Conditioner! Not only does it leave my hair incredibly soft and manageable, but the scent is downright addictive. I completely agree with you – I wish there could be a perfume in this scent that lasted forever!The conditioner works wonders for taming frizz and leaving my hair silky smooth. It's become a staple in my hair care routine, and I can't imagine using anything else. The formula is gentle and doesn't weigh my hair down, which is a big plus.But let's talk about that scent – it's like a burst of fresh flowers and herbs in the shower. It's so invigorating and long-lasting, making every shower a delightful experience. I often get compliments on how good my hair smells after using this conditioner.If you're looking for a conditioner that not only delivers great results but also provides an amazing fragrance experience, the Herbal Essences Smooth Collection Conditioner is a must-try. I'm hooked!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really love this stuff I love the scent I love the texture I love everything about it!
reviews.reviewText: Natural instincts has been my go-to for so many years it is the most pleasant smelling most pleasant feeling great conditioner you could ever use! The price is so great compared to other similar items! I use this not only in my in my shower, but I get a spray bottle I put a decent amount in the bottom add water and then shake it up it makes it a great leave-in conditioner and detangler as good as another product I use that has the number 10 in the name which I will not name but this conditioner does it all and it doesn't over condition your hair it leaves it very moist very supple and very manageable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have long medium-thick wavy hair that requires a good detangling conditioner. I decided to give this conditioner a try because of the price point and the reviews about the amazing scent. My conclusion: the scent is fine, pleasant even, but more salon-like than I prefer. However the conditioner itself is great! I can actually use it without shampoo 4 out of 5 washes because it doesn't leave it oily feeling. I've always wanted to co-wash but I did not think that was possible back when I used suave professionals or tresemme. I will be ordering this brand again but experimenting with the other scents. I haven't tried their shampoo as I am currently happy with Hair One's cleansing "conditioner" as a once a week shampoo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent conditioner! Soft and smells amazing
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used many conditioners, but this one is the best so far. The scent hits you as soon as you touch the hair and it makes the hair very soft after one pass through. This will be my regular conditioner moving forward.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It smells amazing!!! Love the texture of thickness the conditioner is! It has somewhat of a drying type effect on my hair rather than a moisturizer type of conditioner. Everyone has different hair types. I have used this same brand in other styles and had good results. And this one still does work for my hair just doesn’t give it that level of moisturizer I was hoping for- and that’s why I give it 4 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo and conditioner I was using it for years… always buying shampoo for dry hair and none work until I realized I didn’t need to buy shampoo for dry hair… I needed a shampoo and conditioner for the texture of my hair not for what my hair looked like… those other products made my hair more drier… til I bought these products and saw the difference… my hair looked soft and moisture… I didn’t need oils… masks or serums to keep and feel my hair soft… the smell is amazing… when the wind blows you can smell it… then it was discontinued… I looked everywhere… until last year that I saw it at a pharmacy… I was so happy it came back… pls herbal essence… don’t discontinue again… and thanks for bringing it back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells yummy, no lather effect.
reviews.reviewText: Smells great, I had to apply quite a bit but that's ok because it's affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024

reviews.reviewerName: Llegó en la fecha indicada. Este tipo de shampoo es muy bueno. Todo el tratamiento para el cabello queda súper suavecito y aromático
reviews.reviewText: Esta presentación del producto es excelente. Me encanta el resultado después del baño, queda suave, brillante y aromático.
